markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Perfect Dive](/Feats.aspx?ID=2673) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Azarketi" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=336" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Absalom, City of Lost Omens](/Sources.aspx?ID=108) pg. 394, [Azarketi Ancestry Web Supplement](/Sources.aspx?ID=76) pg. 4</row>

</column>

---

You dive into the water with exceptional skill and connection to the waves, urging the water itself to cushion your fall. You intentionally [Leap](/Actions.aspx?ID=81) or otherwise fall into the water, taking no falling damage regardless of the distance.
name: Perfect Dive
